alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Essex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:30PM EDT until July 29 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Caroline County in north central Virginia... Northwestern Essex County in east central Virginia... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 530 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Massaponax, or 8 miles south of Fredericksburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Port Royal, Fort A.p. Hill, Rappahannock Academy, Villboro, Guinea, Corbin, Supply, and Woodford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
